- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1853">gx_canvas_line_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1853">gx_canvas_line_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1854">gx_canvas_pie_draw,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1854">gx_canvas_pie_draw,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1855">gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1855">gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1856">gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1856">gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1857">gx_canvas_polygon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1857">gx_canvas_polygon_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1858">gx_canvas_rectangle_draw,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1858">gx_canvas_rectangle_draw,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1859">gx_canvas_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1859">gx_canvas_text_draw</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_circle_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1860">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1860">gx_canvas_circle_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1861">Вывод окружности</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1861">Draw circle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1862">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1862">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_circle_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    UINT r);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1863">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1863">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1864">Эта служба рисует окружность на холсте с помощью текущей кисти.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1864">This service draws a circle on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1865">Окружность обрезается до недопустимого региона холста.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1865">The circle is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1866">Для этой службы требуется определить GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1866">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1867">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1867">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1868">**xcenter**: координата центра окружности по оси X</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1868">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the circle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1869">**ycenter**: координата центра окружности по оси Y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1869">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the cirlce</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1870">**r**: радиус окружности</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1870">**r** Radius of the circle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1871">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1871">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1872">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — эллипс успешно нарисован.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1872">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1873">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1873">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1874">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) — недопустимый радиус окружности.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1874">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid circle radius</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1875">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — нет открытого контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1875">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1876">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1876">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1877">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1877">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1878">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1878">Example</span></span>

```C

/* Draw a circle of radius 10 centered at (100, 100). */
status = gx_canvas_circle_draw(100, 100, 50);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circle has been drawn on “my_canvas”. */

```

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1885">gx_canvas_pie_draw,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1885">gx_canvas_pie_draw,</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1888">gx_canvas_polygon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1888">gx_canvas_polygon_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1889">gx_canvas_rectangle_draw,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1889">gx_canvas_rectangle_draw,</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1891">gx_canvas_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1891">gx_canvas_create</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1892">Создание холста</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1892">Create canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1893">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1893">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_create(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_DISPLAY *display, 
    UINT type, 
    UINT width, 
    UINT height,
    GX_COLOR *memory_area, 
    ULONG memory_size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1894">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1894">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1895">Эта служба создает холст с указанными свойствами и связанной памятью.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1895">This service creates the canvas with the specified properties and associated memory.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1896">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1896">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1897">**canvas**: указатель на блок управления холстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1897">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1898">**name**: логическое имя холста</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1898">**name** Logical name for the canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1899">**display**: указатель на созданный ранее дисплей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1899">**display** Pointer to previously created display</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1900">**type**: тип холста. Типы холста включают следующие.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1900">**type** Type of canvasThe canvas types include:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1901">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE**: холст памяти, используемый для рисования за пределами экрана.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1901">**GX_CANVAS_SIMPLE:** A memory canvas which is used to off-screen drawing.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1902">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED**: холст, который автоматически отправляется на активный экран либо как часть составного процесса сборки, либо как часть операции переключения буфера для архитектур с одним холстом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1902">**GX_CANVAS_MANAGED:** A canvas which automatically flushed to the active display, either as part of the composite building process or as part of the buffer toggle operation for single-canvas architectures.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1903">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE**: этот флаг можно использовать для включения и выключения холста без потери нарисованного содержимого.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1903">**GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE:** This flag can be used to turn on and off a canvas, without losing the canvas drawing contents.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1904">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED**: зарезервировано для последующего использования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1904">**GX_CANVAS_MODIFIED:** Reserved for future use.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1905">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE**: этот флаг используется приложением при настройке системы с несколькими холстами, которая будет объединять несколько управляемых холстов в один составной холст, после чего тот отправляется в аппаратный буфер кадров.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1905">**GX_CANVAS_COMPOSITE:** This flag is used by the application when configuring a multiple-canvas system which will composite multiple managed canvases into the composite canvas, and the composite is the driven to the hardware frame buffer.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1906">**width**: ширина в пикселях</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1906">**width** Width in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1907">**height**: высота в пикселях</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1907">**height** Height in pixels</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1908">**memory_area**: область памяти холста</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1908">**memory_area** Memory area for canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1909">Это значение может быть</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1909">This value can</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1910">**GX_NULL** во время создания холста</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1910">**GX_NULL** at the time of canvas creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1911">**и** в дальнейшем инициализироваться с помощью gx_canvas_memory_define.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1911">**and** later initialized using gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1912">**memory_size**: размер области памяти в байтах или 0, если память холста будет определена после создания холста</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1912">**memory_size** Size of memory area in bytes, or 0 if the canvas memory will be defined after the canvas is created.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1913">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1913">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1914">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — холст успешно создан.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1914">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1915">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1915">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1916">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1916">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1917">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) — мини-приложение уже создано.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1917">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1918">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) — недопустимый размер блока управления холста.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1918">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS_SIZE** (0x1C) Invalid canvas control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1919">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) — недопустимый тип холста.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1919">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid canvas type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1920">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1920">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1921">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1921">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1922">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1922">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define global canvas memory area. */
GX_COLOR my_canvas_memory[272*480];

…

/* Create “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_create(&my_canvas, "my canvas", &my_display,
                    (GX_CANVAS_MANAGED | GX_CANVAS_VISIBLE),
                    272, 480,
                    my_canvas_memory,
                    sizeof(default_canvas_memory));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the 272 x 480 canvas was successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1927">gx_canvas_delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1927">gx_canvas_delete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1928">Удаление холста</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1928">Delete canvas</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1929">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1929">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_delete(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1930">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1930">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1931">Эта служба удаляет холст.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1931">This service deletes the canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1932">Холст удаляется из внутреннего связанного списка, который хранится в GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1932">The canvas is removed from the internal linked list of canvas maintained by GUIX.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1933">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1933">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1934">**canvas**: указатель на блок управления холстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1934">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1935">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1935">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1936">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — холст успешно создан.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1936">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful canvas create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1937">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1937">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1938">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1938">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1939">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) — недопустимый холст.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1939">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1940">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1940">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1941">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1941">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1942">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1942">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Delete “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_delete (&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS my_canvas was deleted. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_complete"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1950">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1950">gx_canvas_drawing_complete</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1951">Завершение рисования на холсте</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1951">Complete canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1952">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1952">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_complete(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_BOOL flush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1953">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1953">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1954">Эта служба дает GUIX понять, что рисование приложения на указанном холсте завершено.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1954">This service lets GUIX know the application’s drawing on the specified canvas is complete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1955">Приложение может использовать эту службу для принудительного немедленного рисования на холсте.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1955">The application can use this service to force immediate drawing to a canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1956">При этом холст записывается в видимый буфер кадров и/или активируется операция переключения буфера (в зависимости от архитектуры системной памяти).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1956">This flushes the canvas to the visible frame buffer and/or triggers a bugger toggle operation, depending on system memory architecture.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1957">Эта служба должна вызываться приложением только для закрытия последовательности прорисовки, начатой функцией gx_canvas_drawing_initiate().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1957">This service should only be called by the application to close a drawing sequence begun with gx_canvas_drawing_initiate().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1958">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1958">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1959">**canvas**: указатель на блок управления холстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1959">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1960">**flush**: если **_GX_TRUE_**, изменения на холсте отправляются на дисплей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1960">**flush** If **_GX_TRUE_**, canvas changes are flushed to the display</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1961">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1961">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1962">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — рисование успешно завершено.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1962">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing completion</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1963">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1963">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1964">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1964">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1965">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1965">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1966">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1966">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1967">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1967">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Complete drawing on “my_canvas” and flush to display. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_complete(&my_canvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully completed. */
```


### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1968">См. также:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1968">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1969">gx_canvas_alpha_set,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1969">gx_canvas_alpha_set,</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1971">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1971">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1972">gx_canvas_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1972">gx_canvas_offset_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1973">gx_canvas_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1973">gx_canvas_shift</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_drawing_initiate"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1974">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1974">gx_canvas_drawing_initiate</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1975">Начало рисования на холсте</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1975">Initiate canvas drawing</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1976">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1976">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_WIDGET *who, 
    GX_RECTANGLE *dirty_area);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1977">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1977">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1978">Эта служба инициирует рисование на указанном холсте.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1978">This service initiates drawing on the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1979">Эта служба вызывается внутри как часть отложенной операции рисования, выполняемой GUIX автоматически при необходимости обновить холст.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1979">This service is called internally as part of the deferred drawing operation performed automatically by GUIX when a canvas needs to be update.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1980">Однако приложению разрешается обойти алгоритм отложенного рисования GUIX, а также немедленно выполнить рисование прямо на холсте путем сначала вызова gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, вызова нужных функций рисования, а затем вызова gx_canvas_drawing_complete().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1980">However, the application is allowed bypass the GUIX deferred drawing algorithm and perform immediate and direct drawing on a canvas by first calling gx_canvas_drawing_inititate, then calling the desired drawing functions, then calling gx_canvas_drawing_complete().</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1981">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1981">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1982">**canvas**: указатель на блок управления холстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1982">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1983">**who**: указатель на блок управления мини-приложением вызывающего объекта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1983">**who** Pointer to widget control block of the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1984">Этот параметр используется для инициализации обрезки рисования изображения и параметров представления для последующих операций рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1984">This parameter is used to initialize the drawing clipping and view parameters for subsequent drawing operations.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1985">**dirty_area**: область для рисования</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1985">**dirty_area** Area to draw within.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1986">Этот параметр передается вызывающим объектом, чтобы указать область, до которой вызывающий объект хочет обрезать все операции рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1986">This parameter is passed by the caller to indicate the area to which the caller wants all drawing operations clipped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1987">Обычно это область, которая ранее была помечена как грязная, однако вызывающий объект может расширить область обрезки или сузить ее.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1987">This is usually the area previously marked as dirty, but the caller is free to expand or contract the clipping area.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1988">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1988">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1989">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — рисование успешно начато.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1989">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful drawing initiation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1990">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) — превышено максимальное количество вложений.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1990">**GX_DRAW_NESTING_EXCEEDED** (0x05) Exceed maximum nesting count</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1991">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) — нет окон просмотра для вызывающего объекта.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1991">**GX_NO_VIEW** (0x03) No viewports for the caller</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1992">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1992">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1993">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1993">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1994">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) — недопустимый холст.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1994">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1995">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1995">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1996">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1996">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-1997">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-1997">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Initiate drawing on “my_canvas”, my_widget.gx_widget_size
specify the area the application wants GUIX to redraw. */
status = gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(&my_canvas, &my_widget,
    &my_widget.gx_widget_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing was successfully initiated. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_ellipse_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2004">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2004">gx_canvas_ellipse_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2005">Вывод эллипса</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2005">Draw ellipse</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2006">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2006">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter, 
    INT a, 
    dINT b);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2007">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2007">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2008">Эта служба рисует эллипс на холсте с помощью текущей кисти.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2008">This service draws an ellipse on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2009">Эллипс обрезается до недопустимого региона холста.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2009">The ellipse is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2010">Для этой службы требуется определить GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2010">This service requires GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2011">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2011">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2012">**xcenter**: координата центра эллипса по оси X</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2012">**xcenter** x-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2013">**ycenter**: координата центра эллипса по оси Y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2013">**ycenter** y-coord of center of the ellipse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2014">**a**: длина большой полуоси</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2014">**a** Length of the semi-major axis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2015">**b**: длина малой полуоси</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2015">**b** Length of the semi-minor axis</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2016">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2016">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2017">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — эллипс успешно нарисован.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2017">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful circle draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2018">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2018">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2019">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) — недопустимое значение.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2019">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2020">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — нет открытого контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2020">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2021">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2021">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2022">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2022">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2023">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2023">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw an ellipse of semi-major radius 100, semi-minor radius 50
    and centered at (200, 200). */
status = gx_canvas_ellipse_draw(200, 200, 100, 50);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the ellipse has been drawn on
    “my_canvas”. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2028">gx_display_create,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2028">gx_display_create,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2029">gx_canvas_line_darw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2029">gx_canvas_line_darw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2030">gx_canvas_pie_draw,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2030">gx_canvas_pie_draw,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2031">gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2031">gx_canvas_pixelmap_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2032">gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2032">gx_canvas_pixelmap_tile,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2033">gx_canvas_polygon_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2033">gx_canvas_polygon_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2034">gx_canvas_rectangle_draw,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2034">gx_canvas_rectangle_draw,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2035">gx_canvas_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2035">gx_canvas_text_draw</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2036">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2036">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2037">Привязка холста к аппаратному уровню графики</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2037">Bind canvas to hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2038">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2038">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    INT layer);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2039">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2039">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2040">Эта служба привязывает холст рисования GUIX к аппаратному уровню графики.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2040">This service binds a GUIX drawing canvas to a hardware graphics layer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2041">Эта служба необходима только для аппаратных устройств, поддерживающих несколько аппаратных уровней графики.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2041">This service is only required for hardware devices supporting multiple hardware graphics layers.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2042">Привязка холста к аппаратному уровню графики приводит к реализации интерфейсов API gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set() и gx_canvas_offset_set() непосредственно с помощью служб драйверов оборудования дисплея.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2042">Binding a canvas to a hardware graphics layer results in the gx_canvas_show(), gx_canvas_hide(), gx_canvas_alpha_set(), and gx_canvas_offset_set() APIs being implemented directly by hardware display driver services.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2043">Если аппаратный драйвер дисплея не поддерживает несколько уровней графики, эта служба не сможет возвратить GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2043">If the hardware display driver does not support multiple graphics layers, this service will fail returning GX_INVALID_DISPLAY.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2044">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2044">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2045">**canvas**: холст для реализации с помощью оборудования</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2045">**canvas** canvas to be implement in hardware</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2046">**layer**: аппаратный уровень графики</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2046">**layer** hardware graphics layer</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2047">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2047">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2048">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — привязка выполнена успешно.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2048">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful binding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2049">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) — не определена служба уровня дисплея.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2049">**GX_INVALID_DISPLAY** (0x1D) Display layer service is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2050">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) — недопустимые указатели.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2050">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2051">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2051">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2052">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) — недопустимый холст.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2052">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2053">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) — не поддерживается.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2053">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2054">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2054">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2055">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2055">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2056">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2056">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Binds the canvas to the hardware graphics layer 1. */
status = gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(&my_canvas, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the drawing canvas is bound to the
    hardware graphics. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2057">См. также:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2057">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2058">gx_canvas_create,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2058">gx_canvas_create,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2059">gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2059">gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2060">gx_canvas_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2060">gx_canvas_hide</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2061">Скрытие холста, придание ему невидимости</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2061">Hide a canvas, making it invisible</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2062">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2062">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_hide(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2063">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2063">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2064">Эта служба скрывает холст GUIX.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2064">This service hides a GUIX canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2065">Если холст привязан к аппаратному уровню графики с помощью gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(), эта служба реализуется с помощью аппаратной поддержки.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2065">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(), this service is implemented using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2066">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2066">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2067">**canvas**: холст для скрытия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2067">**canvas** canvas to be hidden</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2068">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2068">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2069">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешно.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2069">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2070">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) — недопустимый холст.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2070">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2071">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) — недопустимые указатели.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2071">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x17) Invalid pointers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2072">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2072">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2073">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2073">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2074">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2074">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2075">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2075">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Make my_canvas invisible. */
status = gx_canvas_hide(&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the canvas has been hidden. */

```

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2082">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2082">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind,</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_line_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2085">gx_canvas_line_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2085">gx_canvas_line_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2086">Вывод линии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2086">Draw line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2087">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2087">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_line_draw(
    GX_VALUE x_start, 
    GX_VALUE y_start,
    GX_VALUE x_end, 
    GX_VALUE y_end);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2088">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2088">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2089">Эта служба рисует линию на холсте с помощью текущей кисти.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2089">This service draws a line on the canvas using the current brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2090">Линия обрезается до недопустимого региона холста.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2090">The line is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2091">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2091">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2092">**x_start**: начальная координата линии по оси X</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2092">**x_start** Starting x-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2093">**y_end**: начальная координата линии по оси Y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2093">**y_end** Starting y-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2094">**x_end**: конечная координата линии по оси X</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2094">**x_start** Ending x-position of the line</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2095">**y_end**: конечная координата линии по оси Y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2095">**y_end** Ending y-position of the line</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2096">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2096">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2097">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — линия успешно нарисована.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2097">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful line draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2098">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2098">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2099">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2099">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2100">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — нет открытого контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2100">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2101">**GX_INVALID_WIDTH** (0x1E) — недопустимая ширина кисти.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2101">**GX_INVALID_WIDTH** (0x1E) Invalid brush width</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2102">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2102">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2103">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2103">Threads</span></span>

```C
/* Draw line on canvas. */
status = gx_canvas_line_draw(0, 1, 320, 480);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the line has been drawn to canvas. */
```

## <a name="gx_canvas_memory_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2117">gx_canvas_memory_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2117">gx_canvas_memory_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2118">Определение памяти холста</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2118">Define canvas memory</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2119">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2119">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_memory_define(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas, 
    GX_COLOR *memory,
    ULONG memsize);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2120">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2120">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2121">Эта служба может использоваться для назначения адреса памяти холста после создания холста.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2121">This service can be used to assign the canvas memory address after the canvas has been created.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2122">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2122">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2123">**canvas**: указатель на созданный ранее холст</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2123">**canvas** Pointer to previously created canvas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2124">**memory**: адрес памяти холста</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2124">**memory** Canvas memory address</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2125">**memsize**: размер блока памяти холста (в байтах)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2125">**memsize** Size of the canvas memory block in bytes</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2126">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2126">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2127">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешно назначено.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2127">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2128">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) — недопустимый блок управления.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2128">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2129">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2129">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2130">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2130">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2131">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2131">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2132">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2132">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Assign canvas memory block. */
status = gx_canvas_memory_define(canvas,
    (GX_COLOR *) DRAM_MEMORY,
    (640 * 480 * 2));

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the canvas memory pointer has be
reassigned. */

```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2133">См. также:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2133">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2134">gx_canvas_create,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2134">gx_canvas_create,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2135">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2135">gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2136">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2136">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2137">Определение изображения курсора мыши</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2137">Define the mouse cursor image</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2138">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2138">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_mouse_define(GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO *info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2139">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2139">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2140">Эта служба определяет сведения о мыши для указанного холста.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2140">This service defines mouse information for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2141">Для этой службы требуется определить GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2141">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2142">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2142">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2143">**canvas**: указатель на блок управления холстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2143">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2144">**info**: указатель на сведения о курсоре мыши</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2144">**info** Pointer to mouse cursor information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2145">Определение структуры GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO см. в **приложении I**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2145">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO structure.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2146">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2146">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2147">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — сведения о курсоре мыши успешно заданы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2147">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2148">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2148">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2149">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2149">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2150">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2150">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2151">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2151">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2152">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2152">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set mouse cursor info. */
GX_MOUSE_CURSOR_INFO mouse_cursor;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_image_id = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_MOUSE;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_x = 0;
mouse_cursor.gx_mouse_cursor_hotspot_y = 0;

status = gx_canvas_mouse_define(&my_canvas, &mouse_cursor);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse info of “my_canvas” has been
set successfully. */

```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2153">См. также:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2153">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2154">gx_canvas_mouse_show,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2154">gx_canvas_mouse_show,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2155">gx_canvas_mouse_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2155">gx_canvas_mouse_hide</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_hide"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2156">gx_canvas_mouse_hide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2156">gx_canvas_mouse_hide</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2157">Отключение курсора мыши</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2157">Turn off the mouse cursor</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2158">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2158">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_mouse_hide(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2159">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2159">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2160">Эта служба скрывает курсор мыши на указанном холсте.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2160">This service makes the mouse cursor hidden from the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2161">Для этой службы требуется определить GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2161">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2162">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2162">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2163">**canvas**: указатель на блок управления холстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2163">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2164">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2164">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2165">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — курсор мыши успешно скрыт.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2165">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse cursor hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2166">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) — не удалось скрыть курсор мыши.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2166">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) Failed mouse cursor hide</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2167">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2167">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2168">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2168">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>


### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2169">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2169">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2170">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2170">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2171">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2171">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Hide the mouse cursor. */
status = gx_canvas_mouse_hide(&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse cursor of “my_canvas” has been
hidden successfully. */

```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2172">См. также:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2172">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2173">gx_canvas_mouse_show,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2173">gx_canvas_mouse_show,</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_mouse_show"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2175">gx_canvas_mouse_show</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2175">gx_canvas_mouse_show</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2176">Включение курсора мыши</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2176">Turn on the mouse cursor</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2177">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2177">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_mouse_show(GX_CANVAS *canvas);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2178">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2178">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2179">Эта служба делает курсор мыши видимым на указанном холсте.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2179">This service makes the mouse cursor visible for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2180">Для этой службы требуется определить GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2180">This service requires GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2181">Необходимо вызвать API gx_canvas_mouse_define, чтобы определить изображение курсора мыши до запроса этой службы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2181">The gx_canvas_mouse_define API should be invoked to define the mouse cursor image before this service is requested.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2182">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2182">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2183">**canvas**: указатель на блок управления холстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2183">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2184">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2184">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2185">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — сведения о курсоре мыши успешно заданы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2185">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful mouse info set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2186">**GX_FAILURE** (0x10) — не удалось отобразить курсор мыши.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2186">**GX_FAILURE** (0X10) Failed mouse cursor show</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2187">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2187">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2188">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2188">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2189">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2189">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2190">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2190">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2191">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2191">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Make mouse cursor hidden ”. */
status = gx_canvas_mouse_show(&my_canvas);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the mouse of “my_canvas” has been
hidden successfully. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2192">См. также:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2192">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2194">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2194">gx_canvas_mouse_define</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_offset_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2195">gx_canvas_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2195">gx_canvas_offset_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2196">Назначение смещения холста по осям X и Y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2196">Assign canvas x,y display offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2197">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2197">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_offset_set(
    GX_CANVAS *canvas,
    GX_VALUE x, 
    GX_VALUE y);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2198">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2198">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2199">Эта служба назначает смещение отображения указанного холста по осям X и Y.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2199">This service assigns an x,y display offset for the specified canvas.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2200">Это позволяет управлять положением холста в видимом буфере кадров и часто используется, когда размер холста меньше размеров физического дисплея.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2200">This controls the position at which the canvas is composited into the visible frame buffer, and is often used when the canvas is smaller than the physical display.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2201">Если холст привязан к аппаратному уровню графики с помощью API gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind(), служба gx_canvas_offset_set реализуется напрямую с помощью аппаратной поддержки.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2201">If the canvas has been bound to a hardware graphics layer using the gx_canvas_hardware_layer_bind() API, the gx_canvas_offset_set service is implemented directly using hardware support.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2202">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2202">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2203">**canvas**: указатель на блок управления холстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2203">**canvas** Pointer to canvas control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2204">**x**: координата смещения по оси X</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2204">**x** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2205">**y**: координата смещения по оси Y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2205">**y** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2206">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2206">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2207">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — смещение успешно назначено.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2207">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful assignment of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2208">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2208">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2209">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2209">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2210">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) — недопустимый холст.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2210">**GX_INVALID_CANVAS** (0x20) Invalid canvas</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2211">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2211">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2212">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2212">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2213">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2213">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set display offset for “my_canvas”. */
status = gx_canvas_offset_set(&my_canvas, 20, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the canvas drawing is now offset from
position 20,30. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2218">gx_canvas_initiate,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2218">gx_canvas_initiate,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2219">gx_canvas_shift</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2219">gx_canvas_shift</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_pie_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2223">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2223">gx_canvas_pie_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2224">Вывод круговой фигуры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2224">Draw pie</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2225">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2225">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pie_draw(
    INT xcenter, 
    INT ycenter,
    UINT r, 
    INT start_angle, 
    INT end_angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2226">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2226">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2227">Эта служба рисует круговую диаграмму на холсте, используя кисть текущего контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2227">This service draws a pie into the canvas using the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2228">Круговая фигура обрезается до недопустимого региона холста.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2228">The pie is clipped to the canvas invalid region.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2229">Для этой службы необходимо определить параметр конфигурации GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2229">This service requires the configuration option GX_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2230">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2230">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2231">**xcenter**: положение центра круговой фигуры по оси X</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2231">**xcenter** x-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2232">**ycenter**: положение центра круговой фигуры по оси Y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2232">**ycenter** y-position of center of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2233">**r**: радиус круговой фигуры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2233">**r** Radius of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2234">**start_angle**: начальный угол круговой фигуры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2234">**start_angle** Starting angle of the pie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2235">**end_angle**: конечный угол круговой фигуры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2235">**end_angle** Ending angle of the pie</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2236">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2236">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2237">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — дуга успешно нарисована.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2237">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful arc draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2238">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2238">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2239">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) — недопустимое значение.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2239">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2240">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — нет открытого контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2240">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2241">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2241">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2242">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2242">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2243">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2243">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw a pie from 0 degree to 90 degree in clockwise. */
status = gx_canvas_pie_draw(100, 100, 50, 0, 90);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pie has been drawn to canvas. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2250">gx_canvas_line_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2250">gx_canvas_line_draw</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2253">gx_canvas_polygon_draw,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2253">gx_canvas_polygon_draw,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2254">gx_canvas_rectangle_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2254">gx_canvas_rectangle_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2255">gx_canvas_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2255">gx_canvas_text_draw</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixel_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2256">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2256">gx_canvas_pixel_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2257">Вывод пикселя</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2257">Draw pixel</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2258">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2258">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixel_draw(GX_POINT position);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2259">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2259">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2260">Эта служба рисует пиксель на холсте, используя цвет линий кисти текущего контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2260">This service draws a pixel on the canvas using the line color of the current drawing context brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2261">Если определен параметр конфигурации GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT, выполняется смешивание пикселя, в противном случае пиксель рисуется как полностью непрозрачный.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2261">If configuration option GX_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT is defined, blend the pixel with the otherwise, draw the pixel as fully opaque.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2262">**point**: положение пикселя для рисования на осях X и Y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2262">**point** x,y position of pixel to draw</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2263">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2263">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2264">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — карта отображения пикселей успешно нарисована.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2264">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2265">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2265">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2266">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — нет открытого контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2266">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2267">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2267">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2268">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2268">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2269">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2269">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_POINT point; /* the x,y position you want to draw to */
GX_RECTANGLE drawto; /* the rectangle bounding your drawing */
GX_CANVAS *mycanvas; /* the canvas you want to draw to */

/* calculate 1x1 pixel drawing area: */
gx_utility_rectangle_define(&drawto,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y,
    point.gx_point_x, point.gx_point_y);

/* get my canvas: */
gx_widget_canvas_get(win, &mycanvas);

/* open my canvas for drawing: */
gx_canvas_drawing_initiate(mycanvas, win, &drawto);

/* setup my brush colors. Use any color ID in your resources: */
gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_ID_WINDOW_BORDER);

/* draw a pixel: */
status = gx_canvas_pixel_draw(point);

/* close the canvas: */
gx_canvas_drawing_complete(mycanvas, GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixel was successfully drawn to mycanvas. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2271">gx_canvas_block_move,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2271">gx_canvas_block_move,</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2273">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2273">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span></span>

## <a name="gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2274">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2274">gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2275">Смешивание карты отображения пикселей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2275">Blend pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2276">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2276">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend(
    GX_VALUE x_position,
    GX_VALUE y_position, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *pixelmap, 
    GX_UBYTE alpha);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2277">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2277">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2278">Эта служба смешивает карту отображения пикселей с фоном холста.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2278">This service blends a pixelmap with the canvas background.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2279">Коэффициент смешивания определяется вызывающим объектом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2279">The blending ratio is specified by the caller.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2280">Альфа-значение может находиться в диапазоне от 0 (полностью прозрачно) до 255 (полностью непрозрачно).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2280">The alpha value can range from 0 (fully transparent) to 255 (fully opaque).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2281">Карта отображения пикселей также может включать внутренний альфа-канал, который объединяется с входящим значением смешивания.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2281">The pixelmap may also include an internal alpha channel, which is combined with the incoming blending value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2282">Эта служба поддерживается только драйверами дисплея, работающими с глубиной цвета 16 бит и выше.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2282">This service is only supported by display drivers running at 16-bpp color depth and higher.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2283">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2283">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2284">**x_start**: начальная координата карты отображения пикселей по оси X</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2284">**x_start** Starting x-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2285">**y_end**: конечная координата карты отображения пикселей по оси X</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2285">**y_end** Starting y-position of the pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2286">**pixelmap**: указатель на карту отображения пикселей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2286">**pixelmap** Pointer to pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2287">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2287">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2288">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — карта отображения пикселей успешно нарисована.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2288">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful pixelmap draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2289">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2289">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2290">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2290">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2291">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) — не поддерживается.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2291">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2292">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — нет открытого контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2292">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No open drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2293">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2293">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2294">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2294">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2295">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2295">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw pixelmap on active canvas */

GX_PIXELMAP *map;
gx_system_pixelmap_get(ID_MY_PIXELMAP, &map);

status = gx_canvas_pixelmap_blend(10, 20, map, 128);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap has been blended onto the current canvas. */
```
