## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_angle_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2762">gx_circular_gauge_angle_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2762">gx_circular_gauge_angle_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2763">Задание целевого угла</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2763">Set target angle</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2764">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2764">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_angle_set(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    INT angle);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2765">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2765">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2766">Эта служба задает целевой угол для мини-приложения кругового датчика.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2766">This service sets the target angle of a circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2767">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2767">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2768">**gauge**: указатель на блок управления круговым датчиком</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2768">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2769">**angle**: целевой угол стрелки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2769">**angle** Target needle angle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2770">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2770">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — угол успешно задан.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2771">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful angle set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2772">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2773">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2774">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2774">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2775">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2775">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2776">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2776">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set target angle of “my_gauge” to 180. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_angle_set(&my_gauge, 180);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circular gauge of “my_gauge” has been set. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2780">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2780">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2781">gx_circular_gauge_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2781">gx_circular_gauge_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2782">gx_circular_gauge_draw,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2782">gx_circular_gauge_draw,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2783">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2783">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span></span>

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_animation_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2784">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2784">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2785">Задание параметров анимации</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2785">Set animation parameters</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2786">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2786">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    INT steps, 
    INT delay);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2787">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2787">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2788">Эта служба задает шаги анимации и время задержки для мини-приложения кругового датчика.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2788">This service sets animation steps and delay time for a circular gauge widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2789">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2789">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2790">**gauge**: указатель на блок управления круговым датчиком</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2790">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2791">**steps**: общее количество шагов для одного вращения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2791">**steps** Total steps for one rotation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2792">**delay**: время задержки для каждого шага</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2792">**delay** Delay time for every step</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2793">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2793">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2794">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — флажок успешно установлен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2794">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2795">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2795">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2796">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2796">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2797">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) — недопустимое значение.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2797">**GX_INVALID_VALUE** (0x22) Invalid value</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2798">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2798">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2799">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2799">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2800">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2800">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set animation steps and delay time of circular gauge “my_gauge”
    to 30 and 1, the needle of “my_gauge” will rotate from
    current angle to target angle by 30 steps with 1 tick delay between every step. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_animation_set(&my_gauge, 30, 1);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the steps and delay time of “my_gauge” has been set. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2801">См. также:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2801">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2802">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2802">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2803">gx_circular_gauge_angle_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2803">gx_circular_gauge_angle_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2804">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2804">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2805">gx_circular_gauge_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2805">gx_circular_gauge_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2806">gx_circular_gauge_draw,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2806">gx_circular_gauge_draw,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2807">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2807">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span></span>

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_background_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2808">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2808">gx_circular_gauge_background_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2809">Вывод фона кругового датчика</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2809">Draw circular gauge background</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2810">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2810">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_circular_gauge_background_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2811">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2811">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2812">Эта служба рисует фон указанного кругового датчика.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2812">This service draws background of the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2813">Эта служба обычно вызывается внутри функции gx_circular_gauge_draw, но предоставляется приложению для помощи в написании пользовательских функций рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2813">This service is normally called internally by the gx_circular_gauge_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2814">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2814">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2815">**gauge**: указатель на блок управления круговым датчиком</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2815">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2816">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2816">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2817">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2817">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2818">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2818">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2819">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2819">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2820">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2820">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw circular gauge background. */
gx_circular_gauge_background_draw(&my_circular_gauge);
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2821">См. также:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2821">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2822">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2822">gx_circular_gauge_angle_get,</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2824">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2824">gx_circular_gauge_animation_set,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2825">gx_circular_gauge_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2825">gx_circular_gauge_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2826">gx_circular_gauge_draw,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2826">gx_circular_gauge_draw,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2827">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2827">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span></span>

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2828">gx_circular_gauge_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2828">gx_circular_gauge_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2829">Создание кругового датчика</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2829">Create circular gauge</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2830">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2830">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_create(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO *info,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID background_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT circular_gauge_id,
    GX_VALUE xpos,
    GX_VALUE ypos);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2831">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2831">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2832">Эта служба создает мини-приложение кругового датчика с указанными свойствами.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2832">This service creates a circular gauge widget with the specified properties.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2833">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2833">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2834">**gauge**: указатель на блок управления круговым датчиком</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2834">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2835">**name**: логическое имя мини-приложения кругового датчика</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2835">**name** Logical name of circular gauge widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2836">**parent**: указатель на родительское мини-приложение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2836">**parent** Pointer to the parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2837">**info**: указатель на информационную структуру датчика</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2837">**info** Pointer to the gauge information structure.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2838">Определение структуры GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO см. в **приложении I**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2838">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_INFO structure</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2839">**background_id**: ИД ресурса карты отображения пикселей фона кругового датчика</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2839">**background_id** Resource ID of circular gauge background pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2840">**style**: стиль кругового датчика</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2840">**style** Style of circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2841">Предварительно заданные общие стили для всех мини-приложений, а также стили для конкретного мини-приложения см. в **приложении D**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2841">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2842">**circular_gauge_id**: определяемый приложением идентификатор кругового датчика</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2842">**circular_gauge_id** Application-defined ID of circular gauge</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2843">**xpos**: координата положения датчика по оси X</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2843">**xpos** Gauge x-coordinate position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2844">**ypos**: координата положения датчика по оси Y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2844">**ypos** Gauge y-coordinate position</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2845">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2845">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2846">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — флажок успешно установлен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2846">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful checkbox select</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2847">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2847">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2848">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2848">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2849">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) — недопустимый размер блока управления.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2849">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2850">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) — мини-приложение уже создано.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2850">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2851">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2851">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2852">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2852">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2853">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2853">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE gauge_info;

gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_steps = 30;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_animation_delay = 1;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_xpos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_ypos = 140;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_xcor = 20;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_neelde_ycor = 88;
gauge_info.gx_circular_gauge_info_needle_pixelmap = GX_PIXELMAP_ID_NEEDLE;

/* Create “my_gauge”. */
status = gx_circular_gauge_create(&my_gauge, “my_gauge”,
            &my_parent,
            &gauge_info, MY_PIXELMAP_RESOURCE_ID, GX_NULL,
            MY_ICON_ID, 5, 30);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the circular gauge “my_gauge” has been created. */
```

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2861">gx_circular_gauge_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2861">gx_circular_gauge_draw</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2862">Вывод кругового датчика</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2862">Draw circular gauge</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2863">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2863">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_circular_gauge_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2864">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2864">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2865">Эта служба рисует указанный круговой датчик.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2865">This service draws the specified circular gauge.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2866">Эта функция обычно вызывается внутри службы механизмом обновления холста GUIX, но предоставляется приложению для помощи в реализации настраиваемых функций рисования для мини-приложений настраиваемых датчиков.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2866">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom gauge widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2867">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2867">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2868">**gauge**: указатель на блок управления круговым датчиком</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2868">**gauge** Pointer to circular gauge control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2869">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2869">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2870">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2870">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2871">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2871">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2872">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2872">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2873">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2873">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom circular gauge draw function. */
VOID custom_gauge_draw(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge)
{
    /* Call default circular gauge draw. */
    gx_circular_gauge_draw(gauge);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2880">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2880">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span></span>

## <a name="gx_circular_gauge_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2881">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2881">gx_circular_gauge_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2882">Обработка события кругового датчика</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2882">Process circular gauge event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2883">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2883">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_circular_gauge_event_process(
    GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2884">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2884">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2885">Эта служба обрабатывает событие для указанного кругового датчика.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2885">This service processes an event for the specified circular gauge.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2886">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2886">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2887">**gauge**: указатель на блок управления датчиком</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2887">**gauge** Pointer to gauge control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2888">**event_ptr**: указатель на событие для обработки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2888">**event_ptr** Pointer to event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2889">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2889">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2890">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — событие датчика успешно обработано.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2890">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful gauge event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2891">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2891">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2892">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2892">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2893">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2893">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2894">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2894">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2895">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2895">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic circular gauge event processing as part of custom event processing function. */
UINT custom_gauge_event_process(GX_CIRCULAR_GAUGE *gauge,
    GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default circular gauge
             event processing */
        status = gx_circular_gauge_event_process(gauge, event);
        break;
}
return status;
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_default"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2903">gx_context_brush_default</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2903">gx_context_brush_default</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2904">Задание кисти текущего контекста рисования</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2904">Set brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2905">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2905">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_default(GX_DRAW_CONTEXT *context);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2906">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2906">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2907">Эта служба задает для кисти указанного контекста рисования значение по умолчанию.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2907">This service sets the brush of the specified drawing context to default.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2908">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2908">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2909">**context**: указатель на блок управления контекстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2909">**context** Pointer to context control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2910">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2910">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — успешно.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2912">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель контекста.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2912">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid context pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2913">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2913">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2914">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2914">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2915">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2915">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush of “my_context” to default. */
status = gx_context_brush_default(&my_context);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of “my_context” has been set to default. */

```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_define"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2930">gx_context_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2930">gx_context_brush_define</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2931">Определение кисти текущего контекста рисования</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2931">Define brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2932">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2932">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_define(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id, 
    UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2933">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2933">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2934">Эта служба определяет кисть текущего контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2934">This service defines the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2935">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2935">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2936">**line_color_id**: идентификатор ресурса для цвета линии</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2936">**line_color_id** Resource ID of line color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2937">В **приложении B** указаны предварительно определенные идентификаторы ресурсов цвета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2937">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2938">Обратите внимание, что приложение также может добавлять настраиваемые идентификаторы ресурсов цвета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2938">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2939">**fill_color_id**: идентификатор ресурса цвета заливки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2939">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2940">В **приложении B** указаны предварительно определенные идентификаторы ресурсов цвета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2940">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2941">Обратите внимание, что приложение также может добавлять настраиваемые идентификаторы ресурсов цвета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2941">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2942">**style**: стиль кисти</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2942">**style** Style of brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2943">В **приложении D** описаны поддерживаемые стили кисти.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2943">**Appendix D** describes the supported brush styles.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2944">Стили кисти можно объединить в одну переменную с помощью побитовой операции OR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2944">Brush styles can be combined into one variable using bitwise OR operation.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2945">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2945">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2946">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — кисть контекста успешно определена.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2946">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2947">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) — недопустимый идентификатор ресурса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2947">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2948">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — нет активного контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2948">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2949">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) — недопустимый идентификатор ресурса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2949">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2950">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — нет активного контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2950">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2951">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2951">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2952">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2952">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2953">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2953">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_define(GX_COLOR_BLACK_ID,
    GX_COLOR_BLACK_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BORDER_NONE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been defined. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2968">gx_context_brush_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2968">gx_context_brush_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2969">Получение кисти текущего контекста рисования</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2969">Get brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2970">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2970">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_get(GX_BRUSH **return_brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2971">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2971">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2972">Эта служба возвращает указатель на активную кисть в текущем контексте рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2972">This service returns a pointer to the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2973">Если активный контекст рисования отсутствует, происходит сбой службы и возвращается указатель NULL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2973">If there is no active drawing context, the service fails and returns a NULL pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2974">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2974">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2975">**return_brush**: указатель на назначение для кисти</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2975">**return_brush** Pointer to destination for brush.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2976">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2976">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2977">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — кисть для контекста успешно получена.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2977">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved context brush</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2978">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — нет активного контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2978">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2979">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2979">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2980">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2980">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2981">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2981">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2982">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2982">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRUSH *my_brush;

/* Get the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_get(&my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been retrieved. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2987">gx_context_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2987">gx_context_brush_define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2988">gx_context_brush_pattern_set,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2988">gx_context_brush_pattern_set,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2989">gx_context_brush_width_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2989">gx_context_brush_width_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2990">gx_context_fill_color_set,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2990">gx_context_fill_color_set,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2991">gx_context_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2991">gx_context_font_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2992">gx_context_line_color_set,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2992">gx_context_line_color_set,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2993">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2993">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2994">gx_context_raw_brush_define,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2994">gx_context_raw_brush_define,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2995">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2995">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2996">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2996">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_brush_pattern_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2997">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2997">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2998">Задание узора кисти текущего контекста рисования</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2998">Set brush pattern of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-2999">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-2999">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_pattern_set(ULONG pattern);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3000">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3000">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3001">Эта служба задает узор кисти текущего контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3001">This service sets the brush pattern of the current drawing context.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3002">Узор кисти используется для рисования пунктирных горизонтальных и вертикальных линий.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3002">The brush pattern is used for drawing dashed horizontal and dashed vertical lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3003">При вызове gx_canvas_line_draw(), если линия горизонтальная или вертикальная, а значение в поле brush.gx_brush_line_pattern не равно нулю, рисуется узорная линия.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3003">When the gx_canvas_line_draw() is called, and the line is horizontal or vertical, and the brush.gx_brush_line_pattern field is non-zero, a pattern line is drawn.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3004">Маска узора кисти в настоящее время поддерживается только для горизонтальных и вертикальных линий.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3004">The brush pattern mask is currently only supported for horizontal and vertical lines.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3005">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3005">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3006">**pattern**: узор, используемый для кисти</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3006">**pattern** Pattern to be used for the brush.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3007">Это простой узор шестнадцатеричного включения или отключения, используемый для рисования узорной линии.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3007">This is a simple hexidecimal on/off pattern to be used for pattern line drawing.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3008">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3008">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3009">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — кисть контекста успешно задана.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3009">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3010">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — недопустимый контекст рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3010">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3011">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3011">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3012">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3012">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3013">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3013">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush pattern for the current contex. */
status = gx_context_brush_pattern_set(0x80808080);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush pattern of the current context
has been set to the specified pattern. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3020">gx_context_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3020">gx_context_fill_color_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3021">gx_context_font_set,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3021">gx_context_font_set,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3022">gx_context_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3022">gx_context_line_color_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3023">gx_context_pixelmap_set,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3023">gx_context_pixelmap_set,</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3025">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3025">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set,</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3026">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3026">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_brush_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3027">gx_context_brush_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3027">gx_context_brush_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3028">Задание кисти текущего контекста рисования</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3028">Set brush of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3029">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3029">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_set(GX_BRUSH *brush);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3030">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3030">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3031">Эта служба задает кисть текущего контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3031">This service sets the brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3032">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3032">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3033">**brush**: указатель на кисть, используемую для текущего контекста</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3033">**brush** Pointer to brush to use for current context.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3034">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3034">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3035">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — кисть контекста успешно задана.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3035">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3036">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — нет активного контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3036">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3037">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3037">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3038">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3038">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3039">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3039">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3040">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3040">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_BRSUH my_brush;
GX_FONT *font;
GX_COLOR fill_color;
GX_COLOR line_color;

/* Retrieve the font that associated with the specified font ID. */
gx_context_font_get(MY_FONT_ID, &font);

/* Retrieve the color that associated with the specified color ID. */
gx_context_color_get(MY_FILL_COLOR_ID, &fill_color);
gx_context_color_get(MY_LINE_COLOR, &line_color);

my_brush.gx_brush_pixelmap = MY_PIXELMAP_ID;
my_brush.gx_brush_font = font;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_pattern = 0x80808080;
my_brush.gx_brush_pattern_mask = 0x80000000;
my_brush.gx_brush_fill_color = fill_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_line_color = line_color;
my_brush.gx_brush_style = GX_BRSUH_SOLID_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ALIAS |
                          GX_BRUSH_PIXELMAP_FILL | GX_BRUSH_ROUND
my_brush.gx_brush_width = 2;
my_brush.gx_brush_alpha = 255;

/* Set the brush of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_set(my_brush);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_style_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3055">gx_context_brush_style_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3055">gx_context_brush_style_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3056">Задание стиля кисти текущего контекста рисования</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3056">Set brush style of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3057">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3057">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_style_set(UINT style);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3058">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3058">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3059">Эта служба задает стиль кисти текущего контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3059">This service sets the brush style of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3060">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3060">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3061">**style**: стиль кисти текущего контекста</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3061">**style** Brush style of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3062">Предварительно заданные общие стили для всех мини-приложений, а также стили для конкретного мини-приложения см. в **приложении D**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3062">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3063">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3063">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3064">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — стиль кисти контекста успешно задан.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3064">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush style set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3065">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — нет активного контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3065">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3066">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3066">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3067">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3067">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3068">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3068">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush style of the current context. */
status = gx_context_brush_style_set(GX_BRUSH_ALIAS);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush style of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_brush_width_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3083">gx_context_brush_width_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3083">gx_context_brush_width_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3084">Задание ширины кисти текущего контекста рисования</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3084">Set brush width of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3085">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3085">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_brush_width_set(UINT width);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3086">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3086">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3087">Эта служба задает ширину активной кисти в текущем контексте рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3087">This service sets the width of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3088">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3088">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3089">**width**: ширина кисти текущего контекста (в пикселях)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3089">**width** Brush width in pixels of current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3090">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3090">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3091">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — ширина кисти контекста успешно задана.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3091">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context brush width set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3092">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — нет активного контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3092">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3093">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3093">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3094">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3094">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3095">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3095">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the brush width of the current context to 10 pixels. */
status = gx_context_brush_width_set(10); /*

If status is GX_SUCCESS the brush width of the current context has been set to 10. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_color_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3110">gx_context_color_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3110">gx_context_color_get</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3111">Получение значения цвета, связанного с идентификатором цвета в текущем контексте рисования</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3111">Get color value associated with color ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3112">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3112">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_color_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID color_id,
    GX_COLOR *return_color);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3113">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3113">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3114">Эта служба получает значение цвета, связанное с указанным идентификатором цвета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3114">This service retrieves the color value associated with the indicated color ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3115">Значение цвета возвращается в формате цвета активного контекста.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3115">The color value is returned in the color format of the active context display.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3116">Эту службу следует вызывать только внутри активной операции рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3116">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3117">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3117">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3118">**color_id**: идентификатор запрошенного цвета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3118">**color_id** Resource ID of color requested.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3119">**return_color**: адрес переменной для хранения возвращенного значения цвета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3119">**return_color** Address of variable to hold returned color value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3120">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3120">Return Values</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3121">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — значение цвета успешно получено.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3121">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful color value get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3122">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) — недопустимый идентификатор ресурса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3122">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3123">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — нет активного контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3123">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3124">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3124">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3125">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3125">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3126">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3126">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3127">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3127">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_COLOR color_value;

/* Get the color vaue. */
status = gx_context_color_get(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID, &color_value);
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3128">См. также:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3128">See Also</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_fill_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3142">gx_context_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3142">gx_context_fill_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3143">Задание цвета заливки текущего контекста рисования</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3143">Set fill color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3144">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3144">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_fill_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3145">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3145">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3146">Эта служба задает цвет заливки активной кисти в текущем контексте рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3146">This service sets the fill color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3147">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3147">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3148">**fill_color_id**: идентификатор ресурса цвета заливки текущего контекста</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3148">**fill_color_id** Resource ID of fill color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3149">В **приложении B** указаны предварительно определенные идентификаторы ресурсов цвета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3149">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3150">Обратите внимание, что приложение также может добавлять настраиваемые идентификаторы ресурсов цвета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3150">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3151">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3151">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3152">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — цвет контекста успешно задан.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3152">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context fill color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3153">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) — недопустимый идентификатор ресурса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3153">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3154">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — нет активного контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3154">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3155">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3155">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3156">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3156">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3157">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3157">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the fill color of the current context to black. */
status = gx_context_fill_color_set(MY_BLACK_COLOR_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the fill color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3158">См. также:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3158">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3162">gx_context_brush_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3162">gx_context_brush_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3163">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3163">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3171">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3171">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_font_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3172">gx_context_font_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3172">gx_context_font_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3173">Получение шрифта, связанного с идентификатором шрифта в текущем контексте рисования</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3173">Get font associated with font ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3174">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3174">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id,
    GX_FONT **return_font);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3175">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3175">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3176">Эта служба получает указатель на шрифт, связанный с указанным идентификатором шрифта.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3176">This service retrieves the font pointer associated with the indicated font ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3177">Эту службу следует вызывать только внутри активной операции рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3177">This service should only be called from within an active drawing operation.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3178">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3178">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3179">**font_id**: идентификатор ресурса запрошенного шрифта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3179">**font_id** Resource ID of font requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3180">**return_font**: адрес переменной для хранения возвращенного указателя шрифта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3180">**return_font** Address of variable to hold returned font pointer.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3181">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3181">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3182">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — шрифт успешно получен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3182">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved font</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3183">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) — недопустимый идентификатор ресурса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3183">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3184">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — нет активного контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3184">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3185">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3185">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3186">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3186">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3187">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3187">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3188">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3188">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_FONT *my_font;

/* Get the font pointer. */
status = gx_context_font_get(MY_MIDSIZE_FONT, &my_font);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the font that indicated with MY_MIDSIZE_FONT has been successfully retrieved. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_font_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3203">gx_context_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3203">gx_context_font_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3204">Задание шрифта текущего контекста рисования</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3204">Set font of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3205">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3205">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_font_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID font_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3206">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3206">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3207">Эта служба задает шрифт в активной кисти текущего контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3207">This service sets the font in the active brush of the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3208">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3208">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3209">**font_id**: идентификатор ресурса шрифта текущего контекста</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3209">**font_id** Font resource ID of current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3210">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3210">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3211">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — шрифт контекста успешно задан.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3211">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context font set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3212">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) — недопустимый идентификатор ресурса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3212">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3213">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — нет активного контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3213">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3214">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3214">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3215">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3215">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3216">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3216">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the font of the current context to MY_FONT_ID. */
status = gx_context_font_set(MY_FONT_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the font of the current context has been set. */
```

## <a name="gx_context_line_color_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3231">gx_context_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3231">gx_context_line_color_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3232">Задание цвета линии текущего контекста рисования</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3232">Set line color of current drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3233">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3233">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_line_color_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID line_color_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3234">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3234">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3235">Эта служба задает цвет линии активной кисти в текущем контексте рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3235">This service sets the line color of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3236">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3236">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3237">**line_color_id**: цвет линии текущего контекста</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3237">**line_color_id** Line color of current context.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3238">В **приложении B** указаны предварительно определенные идентификаторы ресурсов цвета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3238">**Appendix B** contains pre-defined color Resource IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3239">Обратите внимание, что приложение также может добавлять настраиваемые идентификаторы ресурсов цвета.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3239">Note that the application may add custom color Resource IDs as well.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3240">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3240">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3241">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — контекстный цвет линии успешно задан.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3241">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context line color set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3242">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) — недопустимый идентификатор ресурса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3242">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3243">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — нет активного контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3243">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3244">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3244">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3245">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3245">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3246">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3246">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the line color of the current context to black. */
status = gx_context_line_color_set(GX_COLOR_BLACK_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the line color of the current context has been set to black. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3251">gx_context_brush_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3251">gx_context_brush_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3252">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3252">gx_context_brush_pattern_set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3260">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3260">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3261">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3261">gx_context_pixelmap_get</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3262">Получение карты отображения пикселей, связанной с идентификатором карты отображения пикселей в текущем контексте рисования</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3262">Get pixelmap associated with pixelmap ID in current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3263">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3263">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_get(
    GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id,
    GX_PIXELMAP **return_map);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3264">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3264">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3265">Эта служба получает указатель карты отображения пикселей, связанной с указанным идентификатором карты отображения пикселей.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3265">This service retrieves the pixelmap pointer associated with the indicated pixelmap ID.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3266">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3266">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3267">**pixelmap_id**: запрашиваемый идентификатор ресурса карты отображения пикселей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3267">**pixelmap_id** Resource ID of pixelmap requested.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3268">**return_map**: адрес переменной для хранения возвращенного адреса карты отображения пикселей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3268">**return_map** Address of variable to hold returned pixelmap address.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3269">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3269">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3270">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — карта отображения пикселей успешно получена.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3270">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully retrieved pixelmap</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3271">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) — недопустимый идентификатор ресурса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3271">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3272">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — нет активного контекста рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3272">**GX_INVALID_CONTEXT** (0x06) No active drawing context</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3273">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель карты отображения пикселей.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3273">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pixelmap pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3274">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3274">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3275">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3275">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3276">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3276">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_PIXELMAP *map;

/* Get the pixelmap pointer. */
status = gx_context_pixelmap_get(MY_PIXELMAP_ID, &map);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the pixelmap was successfully retrieved. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3277">См. также:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3277">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3281">gx_context_brush_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3281">gx_context_brush_set</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3284">gx_context_brush_width_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3284">gx_context_brush_width_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3285">gx_context_font_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3285">gx_context_font_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3286">gx_context_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3286">gx_context_line_color_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3287">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3287">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3288">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3288">gx_context_raw_brush_define</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3289">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3289">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3290">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3290">gx_context_raw_line_color_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_context_pixelmap_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3291">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3291">gx_context_pixelmap_set</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3292">Задание карты отображения пикселей текущего контекста рисования</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3292">Set pixelmap of current draw context</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3293">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3293">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_context_pixelmap_set(GX_RESOURCE_ID pixelmap_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3294">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3294">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3295">Эта служба назначает карту отображения пикселей активной кисти в текущем контексте рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3295">This service assigns the pixelmap of the active brush in the current drawing context.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3296">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3296">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3297">**pixelmap_id**: идентификатор ресурса карты отображения пикселей для использования в текущем контексте</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3297">**pixelmap_id** Pixelmap resource ID to use for current context</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3298">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3298">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3299">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — карта отображения пикселей успешно задана.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3299">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful context pixelmap set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3300">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) — недопустимый идентификатор ресурса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3300">**GX_INVALID_RESOURCE_ID** (0x33) Invalid resource ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3301">**GX_INVLAID_CONTEXT** (0x06) — недопустимый контекст.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3301">**GX_INVLAID_CONTEXT** (0x06) Invalid context</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3302">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3302">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3303">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3303">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3304">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3304">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set pixelmap of the current context to MY_PIXELMAP_ID. */
status = gx_context_pixelmap_set(MY_PIXELMAP_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the pixelmap of the current context has been set. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-3317">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-3317">gx_context_raw_fill_color_set</span></span>
