## <a name="gx_image_reader_start"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4639">gx_image_reader_start</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4639">gx_image_reader_start</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4640">Запуск процесса распаковки и преобразования</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4640">Start the decompress and conversion process</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4641">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4641">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_image_reader_start(
    GX_IMAGE_READER *image_reader, 
    GX_PIXELMAP *outmap);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4642">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4642">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4643">Эта служба декодирует необработанное изображение в заданный цветовой формат.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4643">This service decodes a raw image to a specified color format.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4644">В настоящее время поддерживаются только типы необработанных изображений в формате JPEG и PNG.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4644">Currently only jpeg and png raw image types are supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4645">Для этого необходимо определить GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4645">This requires GX_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT to be defined.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4646">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4646">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4647">**image_reader**: блок управления модулем чтения изображений</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4647">**image_reader** Image reader control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4648">**pixelmap**: выходная карта отображения пикселей</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4648">**pixelmap** Output pixelmap</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4649">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4649">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4650">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — изображение успешно декодировано.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4650">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful image decoding</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4651">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) — распределитель памяти не определен, или не удалось выделить память.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4651">**GX_SYSTEM_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined or memory allocation failed</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4652">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) — входной тип изображения или выходной формат цвета не поддерживается.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4652">**GX_NOT_SUPPORTED** (0x28) Input image type or output color format is not supported</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4653">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4654">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4655">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4655">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4656">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4656">Initialization and Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4657">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4657">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_IMAGE_READER my_image_reader;
GX_PIXELMAP output_map;

/* Create my_image_reader here. */

/* Decoding a raw image according to the settings of “my_image_reader”. */
status = gx_image_reader_start(&my_image_reader, output_map)

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS “output_map” have been loaded with the requested pixelmap. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4658">См. также:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4658">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4659">gx_image_reader_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4659">gx_image_reader_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4660">gx_image_reader_palette_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4660">gx_image_reader_palette_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_line_chart_axis_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4661">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4661">gx_line_chart_axis_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4662">Вывод осей X, Y графика</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4662">Draw line chart x,y axis</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4663">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4663">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_line_chart_axis_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4664">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4664">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4665">Эта служба рисует оси X, Y графика.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4665">This service draws the x,y axis of a line chart.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4666">Цвета оси и параметры толщины линии извлекаются из структуры данных графика.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4666">The axis colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4667">Эта служба обычно вызывается внутри функции gx_line_chart_draw, но предоставляется приложению для помощи в написании пользовательских функций рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4667">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4668">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4668">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4669">**chart**: блок управления графиком</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4669">**chart** Line chart control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4670">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4670">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4671">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4671">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4672">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4672">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4673">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4673">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4674">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4674">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Draw the data line */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(&chart->gx_line_chart_info);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4675">См. также:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4675">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4676">gx_line_chart_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4676">gx_line_chart_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4677">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4677">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4678">gx_line_chart_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4678">gx_line_chart_draw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4679">gx_line_chart_update</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4679">gx_line_chart_update</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4680">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4680">gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate</span></span>

## <a name="gx_line_chart_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4681">gx_line_chart_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4681">gx_line_chart_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4682">Создание мини-приложения GX_LINE_CHART</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4682">Create GX_LINE_CHART widget</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4683">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4683">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_create(
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_LINE_CHART_INFO *info,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT chart_id, GX_RECTANGLE *size)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4684">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4684">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4685">Эта служба создает окно с графиком.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4685">This service creates a line chart window.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4686">Параметры рисования графика и данные графика передаются через структуру GX_LINE_CHART_INFO.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4686">The chart drawing parameters and chart data are passed in via the GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4687">GX_LINE_CHART основан на GX_WINDOW и поддерживает все API GX_WINDOW.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4687">GX_LINE_CHART is based on GX_WINDOW, and supports all of the GX_WINDOW APIs.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4688">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4688">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4689">**chart**: указатель на блок управления GX_LINE_CHART</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4689">**chart** Pointer to the GX_LINE_CHART control block.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4690">**name**: имя графика (необязательно)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4690">**name** Optional line chart name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4691">**parent**: родительское мини-приложение (или GX_NULL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4691">**parent** Parent widget, or GX_NULL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4692">**info**: структура, определяющая параметры рисования графика</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4692">**info** Structure defining line chart drawing parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4693">Определение структуры GX_LINE_CHART_INFO см. в **приложении I**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4693">**Appendix I** contains definition to GX_LINE_CHART_INFO structure.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4694">**style**: флаги стиля мини-приложения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4694">**style** Widget style flags</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4695">**chart_id**: логическое значение идентификатора графика</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4695">**chart_id** Chart logical ID value</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4696">**size**: прямоугольник, ограничивающий окно графика</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4696">**size** Chart window bounding rectangle</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4697">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4697">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4698">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — график успешно создан.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4698">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful line chart create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4699">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4699">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4700">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4701">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) — недопустимый размер блока управления мини-приложения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4701">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4702">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) — мини-приложение уже создано.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4702">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4703">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4703">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4704">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4704">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4705">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4705">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create a line chart */
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
GX_RECTANGLE chart_size;
GX_LINE_CHART_INFO gx_chart_info;
GX_WINDOW_ROOT *root_window;

chart_size = root_window->gx_widget_size;

/* Initialize params for the GUIX base chart. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_min_val = DATA_MIN_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_val = DATA_MAX_VAL;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_max_data_count = MAX_DATA_COUNT;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_active_data_count = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_line_width = AXIS_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data_line_width = DATA_LINE_WIDTH;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_data = chart_data;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_line_color = GX_COLOR_ID_DATA_LINE;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_axis_color = GX_COLOR_ID_AXIS_LINE;

/* Leave room for labels on bottom and right. */
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_left_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_top_margin = 0;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_right_margin = 80;
gx_chart_info.gx_line_chart_bottom_margin = 32;

status = gx_line_chart_create(&chart, “Line Chart”, root_window,
    &gx_chart_info, GX_STYLE_NONE, &chart_size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the “chart” has been successfully created. */
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_data_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4712">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4712">gx_line_chart_data_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4713">Вывод линии данных графика</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4713">Draw line chart data line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4714">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4714">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_line_chart_data_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4715">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4715">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4716">Эта служба рисует линию данных графика.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4716">This service draws the line chart data line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4717">Цвета линии и параметры толщины линии извлекаются из структуры данных графика.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4717">The line colors and line width parameters are retrieved from the line chart information structure.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4718">Эта служба обычно вызывается внутри функции gx_line_chart_draw, но предоставляется приложению для помощи в написании пользовательских функций рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4718">This service is normally called internally by the gx_line_chart_draw function, but is exposed to the application to assist in writing custom drawing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4719">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4719">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4720">**chart**: блок управления графиком</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4720">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4721">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4721">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4722">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4722">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4723">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4723">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4724">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4724">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4725">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4725">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default window draw. */
    gx_window_draw((GX_WINDOW *)chart);

    /* Draw the line chart axis. */
    gx_line_chart_axis_draw(chart);

    /* Draw the data line. */
    gx_line_chart_data_draw(chart);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4731">gx_line_chart_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4731">gx_line_chart_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4732">Вывод графика</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4732">Draw the line chart</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4733">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4733">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4734">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4734">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4735">Это функция рисования графика по умолчанию, которая рисует ось графика и линию данных.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4735">This is the default line chart drawing function, which draws the chart axis and data line.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4736">Обычно приложения предоставляют настраиваемую функцию рисования взамен функции рисования по умолчанию, чтобы добавить такие элементы, как деления, масштаб или другие данные, на ось графика и линию данных, нарисованные базовым мини-приложением графика.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4736">Applications usually provide a custom drawing function to replace the default drawing to add things such as tickmarks, scale, or other information to the chart axis and data line drawn by the base line chart widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4737">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4737">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4738">**chart**: указатель на блок управления графиком</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4738">**chart** Pointer to the line chart control block.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4739">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4739">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4740">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4740">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4741">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4741">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4742">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4742">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4743">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4743">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom chart drawing function. */

VOID my_chart_draw(GX_LINE_CHART *chart)
{
    /* Call default line chart draw. */
    gx_line_chart_draw(chart);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_line_chart_update"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4749">gx_line_chart_update</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4749">gx_line_chart_update</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4750">Обновление линии данных графика</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4750">Update line chart data line</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4751">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4751">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_line_chart_update(
    GX_LINE_CHART *chart, 
    INT *data,
    INT data_count)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4752">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4752">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4753">Эта служба обновляет массив данных, построенный в окне графика, и вызывает перерисовку окна графика.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4753">This service updates the data array plotted by the line chart window, and forces the window to redraw.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4754">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4754">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4755">**chart**: блок управления графиком</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4755">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4756">**data**: массив данных для отображения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4756">**data** Data array to be plotted</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4757">**data_count**: размер массива данных</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4757">**data_count** Size of the data array</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4758">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4758">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4759">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — кнопка с текстом успешно создана.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4759">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4760">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4760">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4761">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4761">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4762">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4762">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4763">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4763">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4764">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4764">Example</span></span>

```C
INT chart_data[100];
GX_LINE_CHART chart;

/* Update the data array associated with “chart”. */
status = gx_line_chart_update(&chart, chart_data, 100);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the line chart data has been updated. */
```


### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4773">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4773">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4774">Эта служба вычисляет значение масштабирования с фиксированной запятой, используемое для построения значений данных на оси Y графика.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4774">This service calculates the fixed-point scaling value used to plot data values on the chart Y axis.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4775">Для вычисления этого значения масштабирования используются параметры chart_info и ограничивающий прямоугольник графика.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4775">The chart_info parameters and chart bounding rectangle are used to calculate this scaling value.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4776">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4776">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4777">**chart**: блок управления графиком</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4777">**chart** Line chart control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4778">**return_val**: адрес значения для хранения возвращаемого значения с фиксированной запятой</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4778">**return_val** Address of value to hold fixed-point return value.</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4779">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4779">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4780">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — значение масштабирования успешно вычислено.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4780">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful y scale value calculate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4781">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4781">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4782">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4782">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4783">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4783">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4784">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4784">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_LINE_CHART chart;
INT y_scale;

/* Caluclate y scale value of “chart”. */
status = gx_line_chart_y_scale_calculate(&chart, &y_scale);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, y scale value of “chart” has been calculated. */
```

## <a name="gx_menu_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4790">gx_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4790">gx_menu_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4791">Создание меню</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4791">Create a menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4792">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4792">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_create(
    GX_MENU *menu,GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent, 
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID fill_id, 
    ULONG style, 
    USHORT menu_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4793">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4793">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4794">Эта служба создает меню, как указано, и связывает меню с указанным родительским мини-приложением.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4794">This service creates a menu as specified and associates the menu with the supplied parent widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4795">Она принимает все типы мини-приложений в качестве дочерних элементов меню.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4795">It accepts all types of widget as child menu item.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4796">Чтобы вставить мини-приложение в качестве дочернего пункта меню, вызовите **gx_menu_insert**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4796">To insert a widget as a child menu item, call **gx_menu_insert**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4797">GX_MENU является производным от GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT и поддерживает все службы API gx_pixelmap_prompt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4797">GX_MENU is derived from GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT and supports all gx_pixelmap_prompt API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4798">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4798">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4799">**menu**: указатель на блок управления меню</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4799">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4800">**name**: имя меню</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4800">**name** Name of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4801">**parent**: указатель на родительское мини-приложение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4801">**parent** Pointer to parent widget</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4802">**text_id**: идентификатор ресурса текста</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4802">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4803">**fill_id**: идентификатор ресурса заливки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4803">**fill_id** Resource ID of fill</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4804">**style**: стиль мини-приложения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4804">**style** Style of the widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4805">Предварительно заданные общие стили для всех мини-приложений, а также стили для конкретного мини-приложения см. в **приложении D**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4805">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4806">**menu_id**: определяемый приложением идентификатор меню</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4806">**menu_id** Application-defined ID of the menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4807">**size**: размер меню</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4807">**size** Size of the menu</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4808">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4808">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4809">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — меню успешно создано.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4809">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu creation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4810">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4810">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4811">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4811">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4812">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) — мини-приложение уже создано.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4812">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4813">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) — недопустимый размер блока управления мини-приложения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4813">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4814">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4814">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4815">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4815">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4816">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4816">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_MENU my_menu;

/* Create “my_menu”. */
status = gx_menu_create(&my_menu, “my_menu”, parent, MY_TEXT_ID,
    MY_FILL_ID, GX_STYLE_ENABLED, MY_MENU_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the menu was successfully created. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4822">gx_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4822">gx_menu_draw</span></span>

## <a name="gx_menu_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4828">gx_menu_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4828">gx_menu_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4829">Вывод меню</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4829">Draw menu</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4830">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4830">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4831">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4831">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4832">Эта служба рисует указанное меню.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4832">This service draws the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4833">Эта функция обычно вызывается внутри службы механизмом обновления холста GUIX, но предоставляется приложению для помощи в реализации настраиваемых функций рисования для мини-приложений настраиваемых меню.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4833">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4834">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4834">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4835">**menu**: указатель на блок управления меню</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4835">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4836">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4836">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4837">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4837">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4838">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4838">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4839">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4839">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4840">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4840">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu draw. */
    gx_menu_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4845">gx_accordion_menu_position</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4845">gx_accordion_menu_position</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4846">gx_menu_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4846">gx_menu_create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4847">gx_menu_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4847">gx_menu_event_process</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4849">gx_menu_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4849">gx_menu_remove</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4851">gx_menu_text_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4851">gx_menu_text_offset_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_menu_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4852">gx_menu_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4852">gx_menu_event_process</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4853">Обработка события меню</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4853">Process menu event</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4854">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4854">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4855">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4855">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4856">Эта служба обрабатывает событие для указанного меню.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4856">This service processes an event for the specified menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4857">Эта служба должна вызываться как обработчик событий по умолчанию любыми настраиваемыми функциями обработки событий меню.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4857">This service should be called as the default event handler by any custom menu event processing functions.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4858">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4858">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4859">**menu**: указатель на блок управления меню</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4859">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4860">**event_ptr**: указатель на событие для обработки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4860">**event_ptr** Pointer to the event to process</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4861">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4861">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4862">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — событие меню успешно обработано.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4862">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful menu event process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4863">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4863">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4864">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4864">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4865">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) — недопустимое мини-приложение.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4865">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x23) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4866">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4866">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4867">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4867">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4868">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4868">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Call generic menu event processing as part of custom event processing function. */

UINT custom_menu_event_process(GX_MENU *menu, GX_EVENT *event)
{
    UINT status = GX_SUCCESS;

    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case xyz:
        /* Insert custom event handling here */

        /* Call default event process if this is a system event such as GX_EVENT_SHOW. */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;

    default:
        /* Pass all other events to the default menu
           event processing */
        status = gx_menu_event_process(menu, event);
        break;
    }
    return status;
}

```

## <a name="gx_menu_insert"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4876">gx_menu_insert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4876">gx_menu_insert</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4877">Вставка нового пункта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4877">Insert a new item</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4878">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4878">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_insert(
    GX_MENU *menu, 
    GX_WIDGET *insert);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4879">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4879">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4880">Эта служба вставляет новый пункт в меню.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4880">This service inserts a new item to the menu.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4881">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4881">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4882">**menu**: указатель на блок управления меню</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4882">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4883">**widget**: указатель на мини-приложение для вставки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4883">**widget** Pointer to the widget to insert</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4884">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4884">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4885">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — новый пункт успешно вставлен в меню.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4885">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully inserted new item into menu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4886">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4887">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4887">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4888">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4888">Allowed From</span></span>

```C
/* Insert new item “my_widget” to the menu “my_menu”. */

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the new item “my_widget” has been inserted to the menu “my_menu”. */
```

## <a name="gx_menu_remove"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4902">gx_menu_remove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4902">gx_menu_remove</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_remvoe(
    GX_MENU *menu, 
    GX_WIDGET *widget);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4905">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4905">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4906">Эта служба удаляет пункт из меню.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4906">This service removes an item from the menu.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4908">**menu**: указатель на блок управления меню</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4908">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — пункт меню успешно удален.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4911">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully removed menu item</span></span>

```C
status = gx_menu_remove(&my_menu, &my_widget);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the item “my_widget” has been removed from menu “my_menu”. */
```

## <a name="gx_menu_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4928">gx_menu_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4928">gx_menu_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4929">Вывод текста меню</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4929">Draw menu text</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4930">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4930">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_menu_text_draw(GX_MENU *menu);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4931">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4931">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4932">Эта служба рисует текст меню.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4932">This service draws the text of a menu.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4933">Эта функция обычно вызывается внутри службы механизмом обновления холста GUIX, но предоставляется приложению для помощи в реализации настраиваемых функций рисования для мини-приложений настраиваемых меню.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4933">This function is normally called internally by the GUIX canvas refresh mechanism, but is exposed to the application to assist with implementing custom drawing functions for custom menu widgets.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4934">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4934">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4935">**menu**: указатель на блок управления меню</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4935">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4936">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4936">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4937">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4937">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4938">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4938">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4939">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4939">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4940">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4940">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Write a custom menu drawing function. */

VOID my_menu_draw(GX_MENU *menu)
{
    /* Call default menu background draw. */
    gx_pixelmap_prompt_background_draw(
                            (GX_PIXELMAP_PROMPT *)menu);

    /* Draw menu text. */
    gx_menu_text_draw(menu);

    /* Add your own drawing here. */
}
```

## <a name="gx_menu_text_offset_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4952">gx_menu_text_offset_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4952">gx_menu_text_offset_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4953">Задание смещения вывода текста меню</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4953">Set menu text draw offset</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4954">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4954">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_menu_text_offset_set(
    GX_MENU *menu, 
    GX_VALUE x_offset,
    GX_VALUE y_offset);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4955">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4955">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4956">Эта служба устанавливает смещение для текста меню по осям X и Y.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4956">This service sets x, y display offset for menu text.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4957">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4957">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4958">**menu**: указатель на блок управления меню</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4958">**menu** Pointer to menu control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4959">**x_offset**: координата смещения по оси X</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4959">**x_offset** X coordinate of offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4960">**y_offset**: координата смещения по оси Y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4960">**y_offset** Y coordinate of offset</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4961">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4961">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4962">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — текста меню успешно смещен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4962">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful set menu text draw offset</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4963">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4963">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4964">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4964">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4965">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4965">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4966">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4966">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4967">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4967">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set text draw offset of menu “my_menu” to (20, 10). */
status = gx_menu_text_offset_set(&my_menu, 20, 10);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the text draw offset of menu “my_menu” has been set to (20, 10). */
```

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_create"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4979">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4979">gx_multi_line_text_button_create</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4980">Создание кнопки с многострочным текстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4980">Create multi line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4981">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4981">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_create(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CONST GX_CHAR *name,
    GX_WIDGET *parent,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID text_id,
    ULONG style,
    USHORT text_button_id, 
    GX_CONST GX_RECTANGLE *size);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4982">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4982">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4983">Эта служба создает мини-приложение кнопки с многострочным текстом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4983">This service creates a multi-line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4984">На кнопке с многострочным текстом отображается текст на 1-n строках.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4984">A multi-line text button displays the button text over 1-n lines.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4985">Максимальное число строк определяется константой GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, значение по умолчанию — 4.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4985">The maximum number of lines is defined by the constant GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES, which defaults to 4.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4986">Разрывы строк задаются символами возврата каретки и/или возврата каретки + перевода строки в текстовой строке, назначенной кнопке с многострочным текстом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4986">The line breaks are set by carriage return and/or carriage return + line feed pairs within the text string assigned to the multi-line text button.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4987">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON является производным от GX_TEXT_BUTTON и поддерживает все службы API gx_text_button.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4987">GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON is derived from GX_TEXT_BUTTON and supports all gx_text_button API services.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4988">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4988">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4989">**text_button**: указатель на блок управления кнопкой с текстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4989">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4990">**name**: логическое имя кнопки с текстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4990">**name** Logical name of text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4991">**parent**: указатель на родительское мини-приложение кнопки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4991">**parent** Pointer to parent widget of the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4992">**text_id**: идентификатор ресурса текста</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4992">**text_id** Resource ID of text</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4993">**style**: стиль кнопки текста</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4993">**style** Text button style.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4994">Предварительно заданные общие стили для всех мини-приложений, а также стили для конкретного мини-приложения см. в **приложении D**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4994">**Appendix D** contains pre-defined general styles for all widgets as well as widget-specific styles.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4995">**text_button_id**: определяемый приложением идентификатор кнопки с текстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4995">**text_button_id** Application-defined ID of the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4996">**size**: размер кнопки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4996">**size** Size of the button</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4997">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4997">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4998">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — кнопка с многострочным текстом успешно создана.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4998">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful multi line text button create</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-4999">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-4999">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5000">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5000">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5001">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) — мини-приложение уже создано.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5001">**GX_ALREADY_CREATED** (0x13) Widget already created</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5002">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) — недопустимый размер блока управления мини-приложения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5002">**GX_INVALID_SIZE** (0x19) Invalid widget control block size</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5003">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5003">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5004">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5004">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5005">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5005">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Create multi-line text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_create(&my_text_button, "my text button",
    &my_parent_window, MY_TEXT_RESOURCE_ID,
    GX_STYLE_BUTTON_TOGGLE, MY_TEXT_BUTTON_ID,
    &size);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the multi-line text button “my_text_button” was created. */
```

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5010">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5010">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5011">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5011">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5012">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5012">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5013">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5013">gx_multi_line_text_button_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5014">Вывод кнопки с многострочным текстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5014">Draw multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5015">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5015">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5016">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5016">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5017">Эта служба рисует кнопку с многострочным текстом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5017">This service draws the multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5018">Эта функция обычно вызывается GUIX внутри как часть операции обновления холста, но она также предоставляется приложению, которому может потребоваться предоставить настраиваемую функцию рисования и вызвать кнопку с многострочным текстом по умолчанию в качестве настраиваемой базы для рисования.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5018">This function is normally called internally by GUIX as part of a canvas refresh operation, but it also exposed to the application that might want to provide a custom drawing function and invoke the default multi-line text button drawing as custom drawing base.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5019">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5019">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5020">**button**: указатель на блок управления кнопкой с текстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5020">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5021">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5021">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5022">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5022">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5023">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5023">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5024">Потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5024">Threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5025">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5025">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Draw the text button “my_text_button”. */
void MyButtonDraw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* Do the normal drawing first */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(&my_text_button);

    /* Add custom drawing here. */
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5026">См. также:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5026">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5028">gx_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5028">gx_button_create</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5030">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5030">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5031">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5031">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5032">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5032">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5033">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5033">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5034">Обработка событий по умолчанию для кнопки с многострочным текстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5034">Default event handling for multi-line text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5035">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5035">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5036">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5036">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5037">Эта служба является функцией обработки событий по умолчанию для мини-приложения кнопки с многострочным текстом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5037">This service is the default event handling function for the multi line text button widget.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5038">Эта функция становится доступной для приложений, которые хотят обеспечить настраиваемую обработку событий для мини-приложения кнопки с текстом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5038">This function is made accessible to applications that want to provide custom event handling for a text button widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5039">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5039">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5040">**button**: указатель на блок управления кнопкой с текстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5040">**button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5041">**event_ptr**: обрабатываемое событие</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5041">**event_ptr** Event to be processed</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5042">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5042">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5043">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — событие успешно обработано.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5043">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully handled event</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5044">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5044">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5045">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5045">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5046">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5046">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5047">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5047">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5048">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5048">Example</span></span>

```C
UINT MyEventHandler(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button,
    GX_EVENT *event_ptr)
{
    switch(event->gx_event_type)
    {
    case GX_EVENT_SHOW:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        /* add custom actions here */
        break;
    default:
        gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process(button, event_ptr);
        break;
    }
    return GX_SUCCESS;
}
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5049">См. также:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5049">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5051">gx_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5051">gx_button_create</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5053">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5053">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5054">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5054">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5055">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5055">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5056">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5056">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5057">Вывод функции поддержки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5057">Drawing support function</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5058">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5058">Prototype</span></span>

```C
VOID gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5059">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5059">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5060">Эта функция поддержки рисует текстовую часть кнопки с многострочным текстом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5060">This support function draws the text portion of a multi-line text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5061">Эта функция вызывается внутри функцией gx_multi_line_text_button_draw() и предоставляется как отдельный API для удобства работы приложений, которые определяют настраиваемую функцию рисования кнопок с многострочным текстом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5061">This function is called internally by gx_multi_line_text_button_draw(), and is provided as a separate API as a convenience for applications that define a custom multi-line text button drawing function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5062">Приложения, которым требуется настроить фоновый рисунок кнопки, могут предоставить свою настраиваемую функцию рисования и вызвать службу multi_line_text_button_text_draw в составе настраиваемого рисования, чтобы нарисовать текст на кнопке поверх фона.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5062">Applications that want to customize the button background drawing can provide their custom drawing function, and invoke the multi_line_text_button_text_draw service as part of their custom drawing to draw the button text over the background.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5063">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5063">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5064">**text_button**: указатель на блок управления кнопкой с текстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5064">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5065">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5065">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5066">**None**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5066">**None**</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5067">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5067">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5068">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5068">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5069">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5069">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Define a custom drawing function */
VOID my_button_draw(GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *button)
{
    /* insert code here to draw button background */

    /* call support function to do text drawing */
    gx_multi_line_text_button_text_draw();

    /* draw child widgets */
    gx_widget_children_draw((GX_WIDGET *) button);
}
```

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5072">gx_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5072">gx_button_create</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5077">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5077">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5078">Задание идентификатора ресурса текста для кнопки с текстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5078">Set text resource ID to the text button</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5079">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5079">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    RESOURCE_ID string_id)
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5080">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5080">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5081">Эта служба присваивает указанный идентификатор ресурса строки кнопке с текстом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5081">This service sets the specified string resource ID to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5082">Строка может содержать символы новой строки, которые выводят текст в нескольких строках в области кнопки.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5082">The string may contain newline characters which act to display the text on multiple lines within the button area.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5083">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5083">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5084">**text_button**: указатель на блок управления кнопкой с текстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5084">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5085">**string_id**: идентификатор ресурса строки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5085">**string_id** Resource ID of the string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5086">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5086">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5087">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — идентификатор ресурса строки успешно присвоен кнопке с текстом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5087">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the string resource ID to the text button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5088">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5088">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5089">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5089">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5090">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5090">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5091">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5091">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5092">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5092">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set the string ID ”MY_STRING_ID” to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set(
    &my_text_button, MY_STRING_ID);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the string ID MY_STRING_ID was set to “my_text_button”. */
```

### <a name="see-also"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5093">См. также:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5093">See Also</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5094">gx_text_button_create</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5094">gx_text_button_create</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5097">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5097">gx_multi_line_text_button_event_process</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5098">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5098">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5099">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5099">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_id_set</span></span>

## <a name="gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5100">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5100">gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set</span></span>


<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5101">Назначение текста для кнопки с текстом (не рекомендуется)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5101">Assign text to the text button (deprecated)</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5102">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5102">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_mult_line_text_button_text_set(
    GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON *text_button,
    GX_CHAR *text);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5103">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5103">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5104">Эта служба не рекомендуется. Вместо нее следует использовать gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5104">This service is deprecated in favor of gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set_ext().</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5105">Эта служба назначает указанную строку для кнопки с текстом.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5105">This service assigns the specified string to the text button.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5106">Если мини-приложение text_button было создано со стилем GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, то мини-приложение создает частную копию назначенной текстовой строки, поэтому перед запросом этой службы необходимо один раз вызвать API gx_system_memmory_allocate_set.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5106">If the text_button widget was created with style GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY, the widget creates a private copy of the text string assigned, and therefore the gx_system_memmory_allocate_set API must be invoked once before this service is requested.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5107">Если GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY неактивен, мини-приложение не создает частную копию строки, поэтому она должна быть назначена статически или глобально, то есть она может не быть автоматической или временной переменной.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5107">If GX_STYLE_TEXT_COPY is not active, the widget does not make a private copy of the incoming string, and therefore the string must be statically or globally allocated, i.e. it may not be an automatic or temporary variable.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5108">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5108">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5109">**text_button**: указатель на блок управления кнопкой с текстом</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5109">**text_button** Pointer to text button control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5110">**text**: указатель на строку, завершающуюся NULL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5110">**text** pointer to the NULL-terminated string</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5111">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5111">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5112">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — текст успешно присвоен кнопке.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5112">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successfully set the text to the button</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5113">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5113">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5114">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5114">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5115">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) — не определен распределитель памяти.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5115">**GX_MEMORY_ERROR** (0x30) Memory allocator is not defined</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5116">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) — недопустимая длина строки.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5116">**GX_INVALID_STRING_LENGTH** (0x34) Invalid string length</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5117">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5117">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5118">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5118">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-5119">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-5119">Example</span></span>

```C
static GX_CHAR text[] = “myrstring”;

/* Set text to the text button “my_text_button”. */
status = gx_multi_line_text_button_text_set(&my_text_button, text);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS, the text of “my_text_button” was set. */
```
