## <a name="gx_window_root_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16792">gx_window_root_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16792">gx_window_root_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-root-window"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16793">Поиск корневого окна</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16793">Find root window</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16794">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16794">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_root_find(
    GX_WIDGET *widget,
    GX_WINDOW_ROOT **return_root_window);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16795">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16795">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16796">Эта служба выполняет поиск корневого окна для указанного мини-приложения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16796">This service finds the root window for the specified widget.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16797">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16797">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16798">**widget**: указатель на блок управления мини-приложением</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16798">**widget** Pointer to widget control block</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16799">**return_root_window**: указатель на место назначения для найденного корневого окна</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16799">**return_root_window** Pointer to destination for found root window</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16800">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16800">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16801">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — корневое окно успешно найдено.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16801">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful root window find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16802">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) — корневое окно не существует.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16802">**GX_FAILURE** (0x00) Root window not exist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16803">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16803">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16804">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) — недопустимое мини-приложение.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16804">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16805">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16805">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16806">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16806">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16807">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16807">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Find root window associated with window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_root_find(&my_window, &root_window);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “root_window” contains the root window for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_scroll_info_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16823">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16823">gx_window_scroll_info_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-scroll-info"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16824">Получение сведений о прокрутке окна</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16824">Get window scroll info</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16825">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16825">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scroll_info_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    ULONG style,
    GX_SCROLL_INFO *return_scroll_info);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16826">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16826">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16827">Эта служба получает сведения о прокрутке окна.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16827">This service gets the window scroll information.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16828">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16828">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16829">**window**: указатель на окно</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16829">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16830">**style**: GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL или GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16830">**style** GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL or GX_SCROLLBAR_VERTICAL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16831">**return_scroll_info**: указатель на назначение для сведений о прокрутке</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16831">**return_scroll_info** Pointer to destination for scroll info.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16832">Родительское окно инициализирует эту структуру для информирования полосы прокрутки об общем размере родительского окна, области просмотра, а также о шаге приращения и ограничениях прокрутки.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16832">The parent window initializes this structure to inform the scrollbar of the parent window total size, viewable area, and scrolling increment and limits.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16833">Реализация по умолчанию использует клиентскую область окна в качестве видимой области и прокручивается по пикселям, но настраиваемая реализация окна может использовать параметры прокрутки.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16833">The default implementation uses the windows client area as the viewable area and scrolls by pixels, but customized window implementation can utilize the scroll parameters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16834">Определение структуры GX_SCROLL_INFO см. в **приложении I**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16834">**Appendix I** contains the definition of the GX_SCROLL_INFO structure</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16835">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16835">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — сведения о прокрутке окна успешно получены.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16836">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scroll info get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16837">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16837">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) — недопустимое мини-приложение.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16838">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16839">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) — недопустимый тип.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16839">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16840">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16840">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16841">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16841">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16842">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16842">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_SCROLL_INFO scroll_info;

/* Get scroll information for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_scroll_info_get(&my_window,
                    GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL, &scroll_info);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “scroll_info” contains the scroll information for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_scrollbar_find"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16858">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16858">gx_window_scrollbar_find</span></span>
### <a name="find-window-scrollbar"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16859">Поиск полосы прокрутки окна</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16859">Find window scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16860">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16860">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_scrollbar_find(
    GX_WINDOW *window, 
    USHORT type,
    GX_SCROLLBAR **return_scrollbar);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16861">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16861">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16862">Эта служба выполняет поиск полосы прокрутки для указанного окна.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16862">This service finds the scrollbar for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16863">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16863">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16864">**window**: указатель на окно</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16864">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16865">**type**: GX_TYPE_VERTICAL_SCROLL или GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16865">**type** GX_TYPE_VERTICAL_SCROLL or GX_TYPE_HORIZONTAL_SCROLL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16866">**return_scrollbar**: указатель на место назначения для полосы прокрутки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16866">**return_scrollbar** Pointer to destination for scrollbar</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16867">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16867">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16868">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — полоса прокрутки окна успешно найдена.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16868">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window scrollbar find</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16869">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) — полоса прокрутки не найдена.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16869">**GX_NOT_FOUND** (0x09) Scrollbar not found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16870">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16870">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16871">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) — недопустимое мини-приложение.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16871">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16872">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) — недопустимый тип.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16872">**GX_INVALID_TYPE** (0x1B) Invalid type</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16873">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16873">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16874">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16874">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16875">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16875">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Find horizontal scrollbar for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_scrollbar_find(&my_window,
                 GX_SCROLLBAR_HORIZONTAL, &my_scrollbar);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_scrollbar” contains the horizontal scrollbar for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_wallpaper_get"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16891">gx_window_wallpaper_get</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16891">gx_window_wallpaper_get</span></span>
### <a name="get-window-wallpaper"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16892">Получение фонового рисунка окна</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16892">Get window wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16893">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16893">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_get(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID *return_wallpaper_id);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16894">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16894">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16895">Эта служба получает фоновый рисунок для указанного окна.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16895">This service gets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16896">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16896">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16897">**window**: указатель на окно</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16897">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16898">**return_wallpaper_id**: указатель на назначение для идентификатора ресурса фонового рисунка</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16898">**return_wallpaper_id** Pointer to destination for resource ID of wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16899">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16899">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16900">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — фоновый рисунок окна успешно получен.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16900">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window wallpaper get</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16901">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16901">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16902">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) — недопустимое мини-приложение.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16902">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16903">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16903">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16904">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16904">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16905">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16905">Example</span></span>

```C
GX_RESOURCE_ID my_window_wallpaper;

/* Get wallpaper for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_wallpaper_get(&my_window, &my_window_wallpaper);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the “my_window_wallpaper” contains the wallpaper resource ID for window “my_window”. */
```

## <a name="gx_window_wallpaper_set"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16921">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16921">gx_window_wallpaper_set</span></span>
### <a name="set-window-wallpaper"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16922">Задание фонового рисунка окна</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16922">Set window wallpaper</span></span>

### <a name="prototype"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16923">Прототип</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16923">Prototype</span></span>

```C
UINT gx_window_wallpaper_set(
    GX_WINDOW *window,
    GX_RESOURCE_ID wallpaper_id,
    GX_BOOL tile);
```

### <a name="description"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16924">Описание</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16924">Description</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16925">Эта служба задает фоновый рисунок для указанного окна.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16925">This service sets the wallpaper for the specified window.</span></span>

### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16926">Параметры</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16926">Parameters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16927">**window**: указатель на окно</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16927">**window** Pointer to window</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16928">**wallpaper_id**: идентификатор ресурса фонового рисунка</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16928">**wallpaper_id** Resource ID of wallpaper to use</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16929">**tile**: если GX_TRUE, применяется мозаичное заполнение фоновым рисунком, в противном случае фоновый рисунок не мозаичный</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16929">**tile** Wallpaper is tiled if GX_TRUE, otherwise wallpaper is not tiled</span></span>

### <a name="return-values"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16930">Возвращаемые значения</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16930">Return Values</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16931">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) — фоновый рисунок окна успешно задан.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16931">**GX_SUCCESS** (0x00) Successful window wallpaper set</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16932">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) — недопустимый вызывающий объект для этой функции.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16932">**GX_CALLER_ERROR** (0x11) Invalid caller of this function</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16933">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) — недопустимый указатель.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16933">**GX_PTR_ERROR** (0x07) Invalid pointer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16934">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) — недопустимое мини-приложение.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16934">**GX_INVALID_WIDGET** (0x12) Widget not valid</span></span>

### <a name="allowed-from"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16935">Допустимые источники</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16935">Allowed From</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16936">Инициализация и потоки</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16936">Initialization and threads</span></span>

### <a name="example"></a><span data-ttu-id="16ebe-16937">Пример</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="16ebe-16937">Example</span></span>

```C
/* Set wallpaper for window “my_window”. */
status = gx_window_wallpaper_set(&my_window,
                                 MY_WALLPAPER_RESOURCE_ID,
                                 GX_TRUE);

/* If status is GX_SUCCESS the wallpaper for window “my_window” is set. */
```
